title: Why India's auto industry is betting big on the grand re-entry of small cars
description: The small car segment in India, once sidelined by the popularity of SUVs, is poised for a resurgence by 2026, experts say. Factors such as two-wheeler owners upgrading to four-wheelers, affordable and efficient urban mobility, and multiple drivetrain options including electric vehicles will drive demand.
